features.name: userId
features.description: Foreign key linking to the user entity.

features.name: assetId
features.description: Foreign key linking to the item (asset) entity.

features.name: timestamp
features.description: The exact time of the interaction. Crucial for time-based data splits and sequence modeling.

features.name: interaction_type
features.description: The type of explicit/implicit interaction (e.g., VIEW, CLICK, TRADE_SMALL, TRADE_LARGE).

features.name: target
features.description: The binary label (0 or 1) used as the ground truth for training the Dual-Tower model. 1 indicates a positive signal (e.g., trade, click, high engagement), 0 otherwise.
